plot: The small Centaur told to Carolina that before coming to Mount Peace had to traverse the maze of spiders. A small place but full of corridors at the end of which lived a spider, but one that led to the exit.
title: Ante la araña
plot_es: The small Centaur told to Carolina that before coming to Mount Peace had to traverse the maze of spiders. A small place but full of corridors at the end of which lived a spider, but one that led to the exit.
plot_en: The small Centaur told to Carolina that before coming to Mount Peace had to traverse the maze of spiders. A small place but full of corridors at the end of which lived a spider, but one that led to the exit.
